sentence.Network_en: The war sweeps up everyone in hatred and recrimination.
sentence.Network_cn: 战争让大家充满仇恨并相互指责。

sentence.Network_en: We spent the rest of the evening in mutual recrimination.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们后来一晚上都在相互指责。

sentence.Network_en: He submitted a letter of resignation free of recrimination or argument.
sentence.Network_cn: 他呈上一份辞职书,内中毫无责怪或争辩之词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: -tion后缀 ... elimination 排除, 消除, 除去, 消灭 recrimination 揭丑, 反责, 相责 culmination 顶点.
teacher娟日志 - 青岛姑娘 - 昂立教师BLOG ... ... Erupt： 爆发 Recrimination： 相互指责 Harsh condemnation： 严厉的批评.

list.abs: ...普遍可见这种现象。如果我们无法掌握这种算念(evaluation)过程，那么人生就必然掉进 “自我摧残”(self recrimination)的恶性循环之 …
He can accept defeat without recriminations ., 他能接受失败不自责.
I don ' t want any recriminations if this goes wrong ., 如果这件事出了乱子 , 我可不要受任何反责.
let's make friends , instead of wasting our time on recriminations我们交个朋友吧，不要浪费时间互相指责

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French récrimination or medieval Latin recriminatio(n-), from recriminare 'accuse mutually' (see recriminate)

entry.tran: 反诉;相互指责;反唇相讥
entry.def: Recriminations are accusations that two people or groups make about each other.

example.ex: The bitter rows and recriminations have finally ended the relationship...
example.tran: 激烈的争吵和相互指责最终为他们的感情画上了句号。

example.ex: The war sweeps up everyone in hatred and recrimination.
example.tran: 战争让大家充满仇恨并相互指责。

auth_sentence.content: I expected much more infighting, recrimination and impasse.
auth_sentence.res_content: I expected much more infighting, recrimination and impasse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I expected much more infighting, recrimination and impasse.

auth_sentence.content: No one has ever considered Father's past something to view with recrimination.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one has ever considered Father's past something to view with recrimination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one has ever considered Father's past something to view with recrimination.

auth_sentence.content: Instead of recrimination, Simpson went to Sydney as Percy's training partner.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead of recrimination, Simpson went to Sydney as Percy's training partner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead of recrimination, Simpson went to Sydney as Percy's training partner.

sentences.en: I don’t want any recriminations if this goes wrong.
sentences.cn: 如果这件事出了乱子,我可不要受任何反责。

sentences.en: It’s the story of a lovelorn girl whose suicide provokes bitter recriminations.
sentences.cn: 那是个关于一名失恋的姑娘的故事,她的自杀引起了严厉的互相指责。
